name: CRT X-Y Library (libcrtxy)

screenshots.caption: Very basic drawing with non-antialiased lines.
Polygons, scaled background bitmap, antialiased lines, alpha

short_description: The CRT X-Y library (libcrtxy) is meant to be used by video game programmers who wish to create games in the style of vector graphics arcade games of the late 1970s and early 1980s.  (Tempest, Star Wars, Battle Zone, Star Castle, etc.)
